caption.title: Equilibrium richness and diversity in different scenarios, for increasing levels of competition.
caption.p: Differences during stable climates between the three scenarios uniform (U), variable (V), and trade-off (T) dispersal, for different strengths of interspecific competition (alpha). (A) Regional ( γ) species richness), (B) local ( α) species richness, (C) mean Jaccard dissimilarity between patches, (D) regional ( γ) diversity (inverse Simpson’s index), (E) local ( α) diversity (inverse Simpson’s index), (F) β diversity (= γ/ α). The seed mass distribution used corresponds to the empirical baseline (mean = 1.5 mg, SD = 3).
Click here for additional data file.
